front.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for the Evaluation of 802.11 Wireless Performance

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Recommended practices for evaluating and measuring the performance of IEEE Std 802.11 Wireless Local Area Network (WLAN) devices and networks at the component and application level are described. A set of performance metrics, measurement methodologies and test conditions are provided that enable such measurements to be made and permit prediction of the performance of installed WLAN devices and networks.
